org.drip.analytics.curve

Class DerivedZeroRate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.DiscountCurve
        • org.drip.analytics.definition.ZeroCurve
          • org.drip.analytics.curve.DerivedZeroRate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve

    public class DerivedZeroRate
extends ZeroCurve
    This class contains the baseline zero discount curve holder object. It maintains term structure for the spot zeroes, the current discount factors, the accrual fractions, and the corresponding dates.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
